languages.text: "Не помнишь? Вот незадача. Ничего, еще полвахты в одиночке освежит твою память".
"You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."
languages.original_text: "Не помнишь? Вот незадача. Ничего, еще полвахты в одиночке освежит твою память".

traits.locale_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."
"You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

languages.text: “你不记得了？那可太糟糕了。不过别担心，再在禁闭室礼关上半巡，你应该就能想起来了。”
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

traits.locale_text: “你不记得了？那可太糟糕了。不过别担心，再在禁闭室礼关上半巡，你应该就能想起来了。”

languages.text: «¿No se acuerda? Es una lástima. Pero descuide, otro ciclo más en aislamiento le refrescará la memoria».
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

traits.locale_text: «¿No se acuerda? Es una lástima. Pero descuide, otro ciclo más en aislamiento le refrescará la memoria».

languages.text: 「覚えてない？そいつは残念だ。でも、心配するな。独房でもう半分を見れば記憶が蘇るはずだ」
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えてない？そいつは残念だ。でも、心配するな。独房でもう半分を見れば記憶が蘇るはずだ」

languages.text: "Ihr erinnert Euch nicht? Ein Jammer. Aber keine Sorge, noch eine halbe Wache in Einsamkeit wird Eurem Gedächtnis auf die Sprünge helfen."
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr erinnert Euch nicht? Ein Jammer. Aber keine Sorge, noch eine halbe Wache in Einsamkeit wird Eurem Gedächtnis auf die Sprünge helfen."

languages.text: « Tu ne te souviens de rien ? Quel dommage... Enfin, qu'à cela ne tienne, un autre quart passé au mitard te rafraîchira certainement la mémoire. »
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."

traits.locale_text: « Tu ne te souviens de rien ? Quel dommage... Enfin, qu'à cela ne tienne, un autre quart passé au mitard te rafraîchira certainement la mémoire. »

languages.text: "Hatırlamıyor musun? Çok kötü oldu. Gerçi endişeye gerek yok, bir vardiyanın yarısını daha hücrede geçirirsen hafızan tazelenir."
languages.original_text: "You don't remember? That's too bad. Not to worry, another half-watch in solitary should refresh your memory."
